tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE equipment_failure_prediction (
  equipment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  equipment_name VARCHAR(255),
  last_maintenance_date DATE,
  next_maintenance_due_date DATE,
  condition_status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE equipment_data (
    equipment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    equipment_name VARCHAR(50),
    equipment_type VARCHAR(50),
    maintenance_date DATE,
    maintenance_cost DECIMAL(10, 2),
    maintenance_notes TEXT
);
CREATE TABLE maintenance_log (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    equipment_id INT,
    maintenance_date DATE,
    issue_description TEXT,
    resolution_details TEXT,
    CONSTRAINT fk_equipment_id FOREIGN KEY (equipment_id) REFERENCES equipment_data(equipment_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Equipment (
  equipment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  equipment_name VARCHAR(255),
  location VARCHAR(255),
  last_maintenance_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE MaintenanceRecords (
  record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  equipment_id INT,
  maintenance_date DATE,
  maintenance_type VARCHAR(255),
  technician_name VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE EquipmentHealth (
  reading_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  equipment_id INT,
  reading_date DATE,
  health_status VARCHAR(255),
  prediction_score DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE SensorData (
    data_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    equipment_id UUID REFERENCES Equipment(equipment_id),
    reading_time TIMESTAMP,
    sensor_name VARCHAR(50),
    value FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE PredictiveAnalysis (
    analysis_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    equipment_id UUID REFERENCES Equipment(equipment_id),
    analysis_date DATE,
    prediction VARCHAR(100),
    confidence_level FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE Equipment (
    equipment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    equipment_name TEXT,
    installation_date DATE,
    maintenance_due_date DATE,
    status TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE MaintenanceRecords (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    equipment_id INT,
    maintenance_date DATE,
    technician TEXT,
    description TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (equipment_id) REFERENCES Equipment(equipment_id)
)

CREATE TABLE SensorData (
    sensor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    equipment_id INT,
    reading_time TIMESTAMP,
    sensor_type TEXT,
    value FLOAT,
    FOREIGN KEY (equipment_id) REFERENCES Equipment(equipment_id)
)

CREATE TABLE FailurePredictions (
    prediction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    equipment_id INT,
    prediction_time TIMESTAMP,
    prediction_score FLOAT,
    prediction_result TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (equipment_id) REFERENCES Equipment(equipment_id)
)

CREATE TABLE MaintenanceSchedule (
    schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    equipment_id INT,
    scheduled_maintenance_date DATE,
    suggested_action TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (equipment_id) REFERENCES Equipment(equipment_id)
)
